description: Displays real-time balances of the DAO's treasury assets, including YFI, ETH, BTC, "cash" (stablecoins), and other assets, as well as liabilities and debt. Useful for monitoring the DAO's current financial position and asset allocation.

panels.description: Displays the total YFI and yvYFI token balances in the DAO's treasury, including both direct and vault holdings. Useful for tracking the DAO's exposure to YFI.
panels.title: YFI

panels.description: Displays the total USD value of all YFI and yvYFI tokens held in the DAO's treasury.
panels.title: YFI ($)

panels.description: Displays the total USD value of all liquid assets in the DAO's treasury, excluding YFI and other long-term assets.

targets.expr: sum(treasury_assets{param="usd value",bucket!="YFI", bucket!="Other long term assets"})

panels.title: Liquid

panels.description: Displays the total USD value of all ETH and ETH-like tokens held in the DAO's treasury.
panels.title: ETH

panels.description: Displays the total USD value of all BTC and BTC-like tokens held in the DAO's treasury.
panels.title: BTC

panels.description: Displays the total USD value of all stablecoins and cash equivalents held in the DAO's treasury.
panels.title: Cash

panels.description: Displays the total USD value of all outstanding debt/liabilities in the DAO's treasury.
panels.title: Debt

panels.description: Displays the net USD value of cash and cash equivalents after subtracting all outstanding debt.

targets.expr: sum(treasury_assets{param="usd value",bucket="Cash & cash equivalents"}) - sum(treasury_debt{param="usd value"})

panels.title: Cash - Debt

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid assets in the DAO's treasury, grouped by asset bucket, over time.

targets.expr: sum(treasury_assets{param="usd value",bucket!="YFI", bucket!="Other long term assets"}<500_000_000) by (bucket)

panels.title: Liquid Assets

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of protocol debt/liabilities in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token, over time.
panels.title: Protocol Debt

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of liquid assets, cash, debt, and net positions (cash minus debt, liquid assets minus debt) in the DAO's treasury over time.

targets.expr: sum(treasury_assets{param="usd value",bucket="Cash & cash equivalents"}<500_000_000) - sum(treasury_debt{param="usd value"}<500_000_000)

panels.title: Assets - Debt

panels.description: Time series chart showing the ratio of total debt to total assets (excluding long-term assets) in the DAO's treasury, expressed as a percentage.
panels.title: Debt to Asset Ratio

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid cash (stablecoins and equivalents) in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token, over time.
panels.title: Liquid Cash

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid ETH and ETH-like tokens in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token, over time.
panels.title: Liquid ETH

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid BTC and BTC-like tokens in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token, over time.
panels.title: Liquid BTC

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of all other liquid assets (not ETH, BTC, or stablecoins) in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token, over time.

names: Visit website nano-eth .net to claim rewards
Visit website nanoeth .us to claim rewards

targets.expr: sum(treasury_assets{param="usd value",bucket="Other short term assets"}<500_000_000) by (token)

panels.title: Liquid Everything Else

panels.description: Stacked time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid cash (stablecoins and equivalents) in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token, over time.
panels.title: Liquid Cash - Stacked

panels.description: Stacked time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid ETH and ETH-like tokens in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token, over time.
panels.title: Liquid ETH - Stacked

panels.description: Stacked time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid BTC and BTC-like tokens in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token, over time.
panels.title: Liquid BTC - Stacked

panels.description: Stacked time series chart showing the USD value of all other liquid assets (not ETH, BTC, or stablecoins) in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token, over time.

targets.expr: sum(treasury_assets{param="usd value",bucket="Other short term assets"}<500_000_000) by (token)

panels.title: Liquid Everything Else - Stacked

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid cash (stablecoins and equivalents) in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token, over time.
panels.title: Liquid Cash by Wallet

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid ETH and ETH-like tokens in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token and wallet, over time.
panels.title: Liquid ETH by Wallet

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid BTC and BTC-like tokens in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token and wallet, over time.
panels.title: Liquid BTC by Wallet

panels.description: Time series chart showing the USD value of all other liquid assets (not ETH, BTC, or stablecoins) in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token and wallet, over time.

names: Visit website nano-eth .net to claim rewards | 0x5f0845101857d2A91627478e302357860b1598a1
Visit website nanoeth .us to claim rewards | 0xFEB4acf3df3cDEA7399794D0869ef76A6EfAff52

targets.expr: sum(treasury_assets{param="usd value",bucket="Other short term assets"}<500_000_000) by (token, wallet)

panels.title: Liquid Everything Else by Wallet

panels.description: Stacked time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid cash (stablecoins and equivalents) in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token and wallet, over time.
panels.title: Liquid Cash by Wallet - Stacked

panels.description: Stacked time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid ETH and ETH-like tokens in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token and wallet, over time.
panels.title: Liquid ETH by Wallet - Stacked

panels.description: Stacked time series chart showing the USD value of all liquid BTC and BTC-like tokens in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token and wallet, over time.
panels.title: Liquid BTC by Wallet - Stacked

panels.description: Stacked time series chart showing the USD value of all other liquid assets (not ETH, BTC, or stablecoins) in the DAO's treasury, grouped by token and wallet, over time.

targets.expr: sum(treasury_assets{param="usd value",bucket="Other short term assets"}<500_000_000) by (token, wallet)

panels.title: Liquid Everything Else by Wallet - Stacked
Liquid Everything Else by Wallet - Stacked

title: Historical Treasury Balances
